location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 23: William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter William Digges Latouche reports that the boat which brought Edward Galley's most recent letter was stopped by members of the Chaub [Bani Ka'ab] people. Latouche adds that he has been assured that the boat will be released.
